sqlMap.select: /* prj3100DAO.selectPrj3100BaseMenuList - 라이선스 그룹, 프로젝트에 할당된 기본 산출물 메뉴정보 목록 가져오기 */ SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT LPAD('ㄴ', LVL*4, ' ') || A.DOC_NM AS DOC_LVL , A.DOC_NM , B.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.DOC_ID , A.UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.DOC_ID, '2') AS UP_DOC_NM , (SELECT UPPER_DOC_ID FROM PRJ3000 Z JOIN (SELECT PRJ_ID,LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000) C ON(Z.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) WHERE C.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.DOC_ID = A.UPPER_DOC_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS TWO_UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.DOC_ID, '3') AS UPUP_DOC_NM , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.DOC_DESC , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_SN , A.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FILE_SN , A.DOC_CONF_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_ED_DTM , A.USE_CD , '' AS ROW_STATUS FROM PRJ3000 A , PRJ1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# ) T START WITH T.DOC_ID = (SELECT DOC_ID FROM PRJ3000 WHERE UPPER_DOC_ID IS NULL AND PRJ_ID = #prjId#) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.DOC_ID = T.UPPER_DOC_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY T.ORD ASC

/* prj3100DAO.selectPrj3100MenuInfo - 라이선스 그룹에 할당된 기본 산출물 메뉴정보 가져오기(단건) */ SELECT B.LIC_GRP_ID , A.DOC_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.DOC_ID, '2') AS UP_DOC_NM , (SELECT UPPER_DOC_ID FROM PRJ3000 Z JOIN (SELECT PRJ_ID,LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000) C ON(Z.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) WHERE C.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.DOC_ID = A.UPPER_DOC_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS TWO_UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.DOC_ID, '3') AS UPUP_DOC_NM , A.DOC_NM , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.DOC_DESC , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_SN , A.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FILE_SN , A.DOC_CONF_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_ED_DTM , A.USE_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ3000 A JOIN ( SELECT PRJ_ID,LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000 ) B ON(A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ORDER BY ORD
sqlMap.update: /* prj3100DAO.updatePrj3100FileSnSelect - 선택한 산출물 확정 처리 */ UPDATE PRJ3000 A SET DOC_FILE_SN = #docFileSn# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND (SELECT LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000 WHERE PRJ_ID=#prjId#) = #licGrpId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#

/* prj3100DAO.updatePrj3100MenuInfo - 선택한 산출물 메뉴 수정 */ UPDATE PRJ3000 A SET DOC_FILE_SN = #docFileSn# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# , DOC_CONF_DESC = #docConfDesc# WHERE 1=1 AND (SELECT LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000 WHERE PRJ_ID=#prjId#) = #licGrpId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
